        Description copied from interface: PageManager
        Determines all usable page templates in the context of a specific tenant. This implementation uses the resolvers search path to find all page resources in a tenants application context. Overlayed page resources are not in the result.

        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        parent - the designated parent page
        Returns:

      • getReferrers

        @Nonnull
public Collection<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> getReferrers​(@Nonnull
                                                                       Page page,
                                                                       @Nonnull
                                                                       org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource searchRoot,
                                                                       boolean resolved)
        retrieve the collection of referrers of a content page
        Specified by:
        getReferrers in interface PageManager
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        searchRoot - the root in the repository for searching referrers
        resolved - if 'true' only active references (in the same release) are determined
        Returns:
        the collection of found resources

      • getReferences

        @Nonnull
public Collection<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> getReferences​(@Nonnull
                                                                        Page page,
                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                        PagesConstants.ReferenceType type,
                                                                        boolean unresolved,
                                                                        boolean transitive)
        retrieve the collection of target resources of the content elements referenced by the page
        Specified by:
        getReferences in interface PageManager
        Parameters:
        page - the page
        type - the type of references; if 'null' all types are retrieved
        unresolved - if 'true' only unresolved references (not in the same release) are determined
        transitive - if 'true' we also look for references of the references
        Returns:
        the collection of found resources

      • retrieveReferences

        protected void retrieveReferences​(@Nonnull
                                  Map<String,​org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> references,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter resourceFilter,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  com.composum.sling.core.filter.StringFilter propertyFilter,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  Site site,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  Set<String> visited,
                                  boolean transitive)
        Retrieves references of a resource recursively.
        Parameters:
        references - collection where we put all references - maps the property value, which references, to the referenced resource
        resourceFilter - restricts the resources we accept as references
        propertyFilter - restricts the properties that are checked for containing references
        resource - the resource to check for references
        site - the site to which we restrict the ancestor search
        visited - keeps track of which resources we already checked
        transitive - if 'true' we also look for references of the references

      • retrieveReferencesFromValue

        @Nonnull
protected List<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> retrieveReferencesFromValue​(@Nonnull
                                                                                   Map<String,​org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> references,
                                                                                   @Nonnull
                                                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                                                   @Nonnull
                                                                                   com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter filter,
                                                                                   @Nonnull
                                                                                   String value)
        adds all references found in the value to the set
